name: Tonn of ways to die
description:
2D game with elements of puzzle, shooter, runner and platformer games. 

Here, you can not kill every enemy, but they can easily do it with you. Sometimes, the thing, you playing will change.

Actually, this is my first game and some bugs can't be fixed because i don't have enough experience and knowledges.

P.S. all the music is not written by me, it's taken from Nuclear Throne and Katana Zero.
